sentences_examples.sentence_fr: C'est incroyable !
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This is incredible!

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā wúfǎ chéngshòu zhè zhǒng yālì.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il ne peut pas supporter cette pression.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He cannot bear this pressure.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 我不曾见过这样的景色。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ bùcéng jiàn guò zhèyàng de jǐngsè.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Je n'ai jamais vu un tel paysage.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I have never seen such scenery.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Le gouvernement accorde des subventions aux agriculteurs.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The government provides subsidies to farmers.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 独自生活不免会感到孤独。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Dúzì shēnghuó bùmiǎn huì gǎndào gūdú.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Vivre seul entraîne inévitablement un sentiment de solitude.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Living alone inevitably leads to feelings of loneliness.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Les plantes absorbent la lumière du soleil et l'eau.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Plants absorb sunlight and water.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Cette boîte est très solide.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This box is very sturdy.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Vous me flattez, je ne le mérite pas.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: You flatter me, I don't deserve it.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Xīyān shì yī zhǒng bùliáng xíguàn.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Fumer est une mauvaise habitude.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Smoking is a bad habit.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 行李需要通过海关检查。
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Les bagages doivent passer par le contrôle douanier.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Luggage needs to go through customs inspection.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il regarde sa montre de temps en temps.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He looks at his watch from time to time.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: La pluie tombe sans cesse.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The rain keeps falling.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il est interdit de fumer ici.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Smoking is not allowed here.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè jiā cāntīng de cài hěn hǎochī.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: La nourriture de ce restaurant est délicieuse.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The food at this restaurant is delicious.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: La nourriture fraîche est plus saine.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Fresh food is healthier.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā mǎi cǎipiào zhòng le dàjiǎng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il a gagné le gros lot en achetant un billet de loterie.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He won the jackpot by buying a lottery ticket.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Allons manger au restaurant.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Let's go to the restaurant to eat.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: L'industrie de la restauration se développe rapidement.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The catering industry is developing rapidly.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 这个城市的海鲜很新鲜。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhège chéngshì de hǎixiān hěn xīnxiān.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Les fruits de mer de cette ville sont très frais.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The seafood in this city is very fresh.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Cǎoyuán shàng yǒu hěn duō niú yáng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il y a beaucoup de vaches et de moutons dans la prairie.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: There are many cattle and sheep on the grassland.
